description: Gets a list of the project policies attached to a project. To attach a project policy to a project, call  PutProjectPolicy. To remove a project policy from a project, call  DeleteProjectPolicy. This operation requires permissions to perform the rekognition:ListProjectPolicies action.

parameters.name: ProjectArn
parameters.description: The ARN of the project for which you want to list the project policies.

nested_items.name: ProjectPolicies
nested_items.description: A list of project policies attached to the project.

nested_items.name: ProjectArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the project to which the project policy is attached.

nested_items.name: PolicyName
nested_items.description: The name of the project policy.

nested_items.name: PolicyRevisionId
nested_items.description: The revision ID of the project policy.

nested_items.name: PolicyDocument
nested_items.description: The JSON document for the project policy.

nested_items.name: CreationTimestamp
nested_items.description: The Unix datetime for the creation of the project policy.

nested_items.name: LastUpdatedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The Unix datetime for when the project policy was last updated.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: If the response is truncated, Amazon Rekognition returns this token that you can use in the subsequent request to retrieve the next set of project policies.
